You spent many sleepless nights in the garage, laboring meticulously, crafting designs, and running computer programs for a device that could swap two peoples’ heads. You had pondered about how such a device would have a scientific (or self-interested!) use. You pondered whether or not you should keep such an invention a secret. But this test with Nina shattered any remaining presuppositions you had about theory and jettisoned you headlong into real application. An alien! Your wife’s head now resided on the body of an alien!

125332.content:
Suddenly, Farley realized something went wrong the moment he pressed the button. Blinking twice Farley noticed a little girl's head on top of his wife's body. She had shoulder length brown hair, green/blue eyes, and pale skin; contrasting his wife's tan skinned body.

"Excuse me, Mister! Excuse me,' said the girl, trying to Farley's attention by waving his wife's hands in front of him. 'Excuse me, but where am I?"

Taking a second a moment before Farley's surprise wore off. He said, "Um, I'm sorry. My name is Farley Baelin and this is my house. Who are you?"

"I'm Amanda Smith. I'm 7 years old and live on Bradley Street near the elementary school I go to," said Amanda.

"The school next to the big city park?" asked Farley.


"Yes, that's the one," said Amanda.

"Where you in class when you suddenly was here?' asked Farley. 'It's only 15 after 1 pm."

"Uh, yeah I was. Which brings me to my next question,' said Amanda. 'How did this happen?"


Cringing, Farley said, " Well, that's a great question. Well,...."

Suddenly Farley's cell phone rang, interrupting Farley's explanation. "Who's that," he thought as he took his cell phone out of his pocket and looked who it was.

Not knowing the number he held it out to Amanda and asked, "Is this your number?"

Looking at the number closely Amanda said, "yes. that's my phone number. It must be your wife. She must be attached to my body and at my school. Oh my god, what will my friends say, the teacher, my parents!?"


"Well I don't know but i'm going to answer," responded Farley, bringing the phone up to his ear and hitting the answer button....

info.brief_description: A machine causes your beloved wife to swap heads with another woman.
info.description:
You are Farley Baelin, a 6' inventor, aged 26, Caucasian, who has invented a head-swapping remote. You test it out on your beloved wife, Nina Baelin-Valipera, 5'5", aged 25, also Caucasian; and it swaps her head with another female.

RULES:
When the head-swapping happens, either Nina's head or body will still be there; the only thing is, that her body or head will be of another woman.
All of the heads will still have their respective minds.
The person who Nina swaps with HAS to be female. No male-female swaps allowed.
Also, no killing anyone.
